name: Piramide
additionalNotes:
The Piramide is a twist top, or fumo. It’s a full bodied cigar with a rich blend of 100% Puerto Rican long filler. It contains the same premium long filler tobacco as the Lonsdale LF but in a larger package, making the Piramide a true robusto cigar.

Piramide- 7 ¼ inches x 52 ring
